overview: Ben Efraim is an entrepreneur and a seasoned software engineer with more than a decade of experience in IT development and management positions in early staged startup companies that became leading and successful hi-tech firms, including Fundtech (NASDAQ: FNDT), Commtouch (NASDAQ: CTCH), Amdocs (NASDAQ: DOX), OmniSky Corp. (NASDAQ: OMNY), EarthLink (NASDAQ: ELNK) and Quigo Technologies, Inc. which has been recently acquired by AOL for nearly $400M. He earned a BA in computer science from the Academic College of Netanya and is a candidate for an MS in computer science from the Israeli Open University.
